fullText: “Hell’s Kitchen” has earned its place on Broadway: The revised show is thrilling from beginning to end, and easily stands out as one of the rare must-sees in a crowded season.
dtliExcerpt: “Hell’s Kitchen” has earned its place on Broadway: The revised show is thrilling from beginning to end, and easily stands out as one of the rare must-sees in a crowded season.

keyPhrases.quote: has earned its place on Broadway

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Strong unqualified praise with superlatives like 'thrilling' and explicit 'must-see' recommendation, indicating clear enthusiasm without reservations. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses unqualified enthusiasm and positions the show as a must-see, indicating a very strong recommendation.
